PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04882018-05-03
ActInternational Development Research Centre Act
PrecisRe-appointment of SHAINOOR KHOJA of Dubai, United Arab Emirates, as a governor of the Board of Governors of the International Development Research Centre, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 18, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
